name: Frank

topics.response_text: Please! No! I didn't! I swear!

description:
Frank is a 28 year-old Hispanic Male.

Frank is a Hispanic man in his late 20s who serves as the slave bartender at Paradise Falls. Despite his forced servitude, he performs his duties with quiet resignation, mixing drinks for the slavers and their captives with practiced efficiency.

Frank's Personality: Frank has developed a pragmatic personality to survive his enslavement. He is cautious and speaks sparingly, avoiding unnecessary attention from the slavers. He harbors quiet resentment but knows better than to show it openly. He observes everything, storing information that might one day help him escape or at least survive.

Frank's Backstory: Frank was once a resident of a small settlement north of Megaton, trying to make a living as a trader. When slavers raided his settlement, he was captured and brought to Paradise Falls. For the past few months, he has been forced to serve as the bartender, mixing the foul concoctions that pass for alcohol in the slaver den. He dreams of escape but knows the odds are stacked against him.
